business.name: C.A.R.S. Collision & Refinish Shop
business.description_short: Veteran & family owned collision repair and auto body shop in Spring, TX. Expert collision repair, custom paint, paintless dent repair, and spray-in bedliners.
business.description_long: C.A.R.S. Collision & Refinish Shop is a veteran and family owned auto body shop serving Spring, The Woodlands, Klein, Tomball, and North Houston. We specialize in collision repair, custom paint and refinishing, paintless dent repair, spray-in bedliners, and light mechanical repairs. Insurance accepted. Free estimates. Over 30 years of industry experience.
business.payment_methods: Cash, Credit Card, Debit Card, Insurance
business.service_area: Spring, The Woodlands, Klein, Tomball, Cypress, North Houston
